ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We thank P. Hammes, University of Pretoria, for assisting with the experimental design to induce water stress, I.M. Millar, Biosystematics Division, ARC-PPRI, for verifying the aphid identification, M. Smith for assistance with statistical analyses. Potato BP1 tubers were supplied by Rascal Seed Research Laboratories and Potato Seed Production. The study was financially supported by Potatoes South Africa, the Technology and Human Resources for Industry Programme (THRIP) and the University of Pretoria. Lezel Beetge received an MSc bursary from the Potato Industry Development Trust.
